data.name: RPG Maker MV - Sinister Hollows
data.detailed_description:
Music can make a scary game feel truly terrifying. Intensify the thrill of your games with Sinister Hollows.

Created by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Sinister Hollows is a versatile music pack that can find a home in a horror game as well as a classic fantasy game that needs a touch of the spooky, eerie and dangerous. Combining melodic sounds with haunting ambiance, this unique pack gives the right "video-game" vibe.

This pack contains:

  • 18 BGM tracks suitable for dungeons, character themes, cutscene themes and more.
  • Includes dissonant music tracks to put your players on edge.
  • Includes faster-paced themes suitable for battles and chase scenes.
  • .wav, .ogg, .m4a and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

data.short_description: Music can make a scary game feel truly terrifying. Intensify the thrill of your games with Sinister Hollows.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Sinister Hollows
